author: dion
msg: Slightly different version of the code to Colin's patch. Should have the same logic,
use less return statements and be easier to read.

author: bwalding
msg: Removed out-dated target, added info about new pom:contentvalidate target

author: bwalding
msg: An alternative way of validating the POM.  Doesn't use the XSD as XSD doesn't take into
account interpolation and inheritance.  This does not replace the XSD validation, merely enhances it.
